ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter Presents Storm Kids: Monica Bleue: A Werewolf Story
ComicInfo.Summary: Monica Bleue and her father move away to the country to start a new life after the death of her mother. Though she's not speaking to her dad, she begins to find her way out from her anger and grief in her new surroundings. But while out wandering the forests near their home, she comes face to face with a hidden horror that changes her forever. Steve Niles and Damien Worm bring you Monica Bleue: A Werewolf Story, the first story in the new monthly anthology series, John Carpenter Presents Storm Kids.
